instructions:
Heat oil in a skillet over low heat. Add onion, celery, garlic and Italian seasoning mix. Cook covered for
15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove to a large bowl and add tomato sauce, bread crumbs, parsley,
basil, G Washington, salt and pepper.
Break up meat loaf mix and add to bowl and mix with seasonings. Form a loaf, place on a rack in a
shallow baking dish and lay on bacon strips. Bake in a 350 F oven until internal temperature reaches 160 F,
or about 1 1/2 to 1 3/4 hours. 
*(Rev. 12/31/95)*
ingredients: 2 lbs meat loaf mix (ground beef, pork and veal)
1 tsp dried Italian seasoning (mix of basil, fine herb and oregano)
1 envelope G Washington Brown seasoning mix
name: Mama's Meat Loaf
